The Texas Chainsaw Massacre, Psycho, & Silence of the Lambs are all based on real-life serial killer Ed Gein. The new Texas Chainsaw halfheartedly pays homage to each, its predecessor being the most obvious, but also “preserving mother,” the “unsettling makeup sequence,” etc.
